info.name: addControl
info.arguments: (control: AbstractControl, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = false, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

get.desciption: Find and return nested control by path.

info.name: setControl
info.arguments: (index: number, control: AbstractControl, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = false, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

setControl.desciption:
Searches for and replaces a control by name.
If control not exist, the method does nothing.

info.name: setValue
info.arguments: (values: unknown[], { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = true, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

setValue.desciption:
Update the values of the child controls, the length of the values must be equal
to the length of the controls or update not be the correct
for update specific control use updateAt method

info.name: updateAt
info.arguments: (index: number, value: unknown, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = true, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

info.name: removeAt
info.arguments: (index: number, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = false, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

contains.desciption: If the control exists, return true otherwise false

reset.desciption: Reset child control value and clear all errors
